behavior boil_pasta_and_cook_chicken(pasta:item, chicken:item, pot:item, stove:item, pan:item):
    body:
        # Boil the pasta
        achieve inside(pasta, pot)
        # Ensure the pasta is inside the pot
        
        if not has_water(pot):
            # Ensure the pot has water, if not fill it with water
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet)
            achieve close_char(char, faucet)
            achieve has_water(pot)
        
        achieve on(pot, stove)
        # Put the pot on the stove

        achieve is_on(stove)
        # Turn on the stove to boil the pasta

        # Cook the chicken
        achieve on(pan, stove)
        # Place the pan on the stove

        achieve_once inhand(chicken)
        # Temporarily hold the chicken to place it in the pan
        
        achieve on(chicken, pan)
        # Put the chicken in the pan to cook

nd inside(food, cooker)

food)) and clean(food) and inside(food, pot)

behavior cook_chicken_and_pasta(chicken:item, pasta:item, pot:item, stove:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(chicken, pot)
        # Ensure the chicken is inside the pot

        achieve inside(pasta, pot)
        # Ensure the pasta is inside the pot

        achieve has_water(pot)
        # Fill the pot with water to cook

        achieve on(pot, stove)
        # Place the pot on the stove

        achieve is_on(stove)
        # Turn on the stove to cook

            observe(pot, "Check if the chicken and pasta are cooked")

        achieve is_off(stove)
        # Turn off the stove when done
